aboutMe.intro: Hi! I'm Federico López, a Senior Frontend Engineer specializing in building high-performance, scalable, and user-centric web applications with React, TypeScript, and Next.js.
aboutMe.experience: With {{years}} years of IT experience and 7+ years focused on modern frontend development, I've delivered impactful solutions for global companies in wellness, sports, fintech, and healthcare—reaching millions of users worldwide.
aboutMe.passion: Passionate about clean architecture, reusable components, and solving complex UX challenges. I thrive in remote Agile environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive product excellence.

projects.subtitle: A selection of my work, including projects featured in The New York Times
projects.nytLabel: Featured in The New York Times

realevalsgmail.title: Gmail Clone - REAL Evals
realevalsgmail.description: Production-ready Gmail replica built for AI evaluation platform. Featured in The New York Times for innovative AI testing approach. Pixel-perfect recreation implementing email management, compose functionality, labels, folders, and advanced search. Built with Next.js and Material UI for optimal performance and accessibility.

realevalsdashdish.title: DoorDash Clone - REAL Evals
realevalsdashdish.description: High-fidelity food delivery platform clone featuring restaurant browsing, menu exploration, cart management, and checkout flow. Built with Next.js and Material UI to replicate DoorDash user experience with responsive design and smooth interactions.

realevalsuber.title: Uber Clone - REAL Evals
realevalsuber.description: Comprehensive ride-sharing platform clone with real-time map integration, route calculation, pricing estimates, and driver matching simulation. Featured in The New York Times as part of REAL Evals AI testing platform. Built with Next.js and Material UI.

realevals united.title: United Airlines Clone - REAL Evals
realevals united.description: Full-featured airline booking platform clone replicating United Airlines flight search, seat selection, booking flow, and trip management. Implements complex multi-step forms, real-time availability, and responsive design with Next.js and Material UI.

nflleaguefinder.title: NFL League Finder - RCX Sports
nflleaguefinder.description: Advanced search and discovery platform for NFL fantasy leagues. Features comprehensive filtering, real-time league data, team rosters, player stats, and league settings explorer. Built for RCX Sports platform to enhance league discovery experience.

nbaleaguefinder.title: NBA League Finder - RCX Sports
nbaleaguefinder.description: Search and discovery tool for NBA fantasy leagues with advanced filtering capabilities. Displays league information, team details, player rosters, and real-time statistics. Optimized for performance with thousands of leagues.

nhlleaguefinder.title: NHL League Finder - RCX Sports
nhlleaguefinder.description: Comprehensive NHL fantasy league browser with filtering by league type, size, and settings. Features team analysis, player statistics, and league standings. Built with responsive design for seamless mobile and desktop experience.

mlsleaguefinder.title: MLS League Finder - RCX Sports
mlsleaguefinder.description: Soccer fantasy league discovery platform for MLS leagues. Enables users to search, filter, and explore leagues with detailed team rosters, player stats, and league configurations. Implements real-time data updates and intuitive navigation.

factupro.title: FactuPro - Invoice Management
factupro.description: Complete invoice and billing management system for SMBs. Implemented invoice generation, payment tracking, client management, and automated reminders with responsive design and accessibility compliance.

frontendBonzzu.notes: Delivering scalable React/Next.js applications for Delos Company and RCX Sports. Designed reusable component systems using Material UI, Chakra UI, and Shadcn UI. Led performance optimizations through SSR, code splitting, and rendering efficiency improvements.

fullstackFreelance.notes: Delivered high-impact solutions for international clients including Vrio, Wpromote, REAL Evals (featured by The New York Times), and FactuPro. Specialized in SSR, performance optimization, and scalable component architectures.

fullstackNisum.notes: Delivered and maintained React/Redux interfaces for Science37's clinical research platform using JavaScript and TypeScript. Developed reusable UI components with Storybook and partnered with distributed teams across multiple time zones in remote Agile environments.

mainframeICBC.company: ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)
mainframeICBC.notes: Led Anti-Money Laundering initiatives including impact analysis and effort estimation. Developed and maintained COBOL applications in batch and online (CICS) environments with DB2, MQ messaging, and VSAM/QSAM files. Managed production incidents ensuring system stability under strict SLAs.

cobolDeveloper.notes: Developed COBOL components for financial and high-volume batch systems across multiple banking institutions. Performed requirements analysis, system enhancements, and technical design. Leveraged DB2, MQ, JCL, and CICS for enterprise data processing in mission-critical environments.

frontendConstellation.notes: Built customer-facing web applications for enterprise clients using React and TypeScript. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features on schedule.

softwareQuintica.notes: Developed full-stack web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Participated in all phases of software development lifecycle.

spanish.name: Spanish
spanish.description: Native speaker with professional business communication expertise

english.name: English
english.description: Fluent professional proficiency for international client communication
